channel.title: [BUG] Surface Tension: The World's Most Powerful Flashlight
channel.description:
When I turn on my flashlight in the cliffside portion of surface tension, it lights the entire 3D-skybox landscape. I don't know whether this happens further back along the cliff, or only prior to the bombing of that building in the distance, or only from this vantage point (I'm about to enter the pipe taking me to the next section), or what.
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20578437/BM_Bugs/flashlight_st.gif[/img]
map: bm_c2a5c
getpos: setpos -12061.421875 -10185.369141 6773.146973;setang 22.941423 -84.203751 0.000000

When I turn on my flashlight in the cliffside portion of surface tension, it lights the entire 3D-skybox landscape. I don’t know whether this happens further back along the cliff, or only prior to the bombing of that building in the distance, or only from this vantage point (I’m about to enter the pipe taking me to the next section), or what.
